title: SH 183 Photos Dallas
text: These views start on I-35E in Dallas 183 and proceed westbound to Texas Stadium in Irving. Texas Stadium was demolished in April 2010, so all the photos including Texas Stadium are now historical curiosities.

images.caption: Northbound on I-35E Stemmons Freeway, approaching the exit for TX 183
The exit to 183 is just ahead.

Westbound on TX 183. This area is mostly warehouses and lower-tier office structures. The area was developed
					mostly in the 1960s and 1970s, giving it somewhat of a dated look.
On the Trinity River bridge. Texas Stadium is visible ahead.

imageStatus.note: Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015.

images.caption: Still on the Trinity River bridge.

imageStatus.note: Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015..
Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015.

images.caption: Texas Stadium is directly ahead. The overhead sign indicates the spit to TX 114 just ahead.

imageStatus.note: Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015. All properties on the right (north) side of the freeway were cleared for the expansion.

images.caption: The freeway forks, with TX 183 to the left and TX 114 on the right.

imageStatus.note: Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015. All properties on the right (north) side of the freeway were cleared for the expansion.
Texas Stadium was demolished in 2010, and expansion of this section of SH 183 began in 2015.
